1   package com.mamezou.rms.external.webapi;
2   
3   import java.time.LocalDate;
4   import java.util.List;
5   
6   import javax.validation.Valid;
7   import javax.validation.constraints.NotNull;
8   import javax.ws.rs.Consumes;
9   import javax.ws.rs.DELETE;
10  import javax.ws.rs.GET;
11  import javax.ws.rs.POST;
12  import javax.ws.rs.PUT;
13  import javax.ws.rs.Path;
14  import javax.ws.rs.PathParam;
15  import javax.ws.rs.Produces;
16  import javax.ws.rs.QueryParam;
17  import javax.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
18  
19  import org.eclipse.microprofile.openapi.annotations.Operation;
20  import org.eclipse.microprofile.openapi.annotations.enums.ParameterIn;
21  import org.eclipse.microprofile.openapi.annotations.enums.SchemaType;
22  import org.eclipse.microprofile.openapi.annotations.media.Content;
23  import org.eclipse.microprofile.openapi.annotations.media.Schema;
24  import org.eclipse.microprofile.openapi.annotations.parameters.Parameter;
25  import org.eclipse.microprofile.openapi.annotations.parameters.Parameters;
26  import org.eclipse.microprofile.openapi.annotations.responses.APIResponse;
27  import org.eclipse.microprofile.openapi.annotations.tags.Tag;
28  
29  import com.mamezou.rms.core.domain.constraint.LoginId;
30  import com.mamezou.rms.core.domain.constraint.Passowrd;
31  import com.mamezou.rms.core.domain.constraint.RmsId;
32  import com.mamezou.rms.external.webapi.dto.AddRentalItemDto;
33  import com.mamezou.rms.external.webapi.dto.AddReservationDto;
34  import com.mamezou.rms.external.webapi.dto.AddUserAccountDto;
35  import com.mamezou.rms.external.webapi.dto.LoginDto;
36  import com.mamezou.rms.external.webapi.dto.RentalItemResourceDto;
37  import com.mamezou.rms.external.webapi.dto.ReservationResourceDto;
38  import com.mamezou.rms.external.webapi.dto.UserAccountResourceDto;
39  
40  /**
41   * レンタル予約システムのREST APIインタフェース。
42   * MicroProfileのOpenAPIのアノテーションを使いAPIの詳細情報を付加している。<br>
43   * 全体に関するAPI情報は{@link ApplicationConfig}に定義。
44   */
45  public interface EndPointSpec {
46  
47      /** for @RolesAllowed const */
48      public static final String ADMIN_ROLE = "ADMIN";
49      public static final String MEMBER_ROLE = "MEMBER";
50  
51      @GET
52      @Path("/login")
53      @Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
54      @Tag(name = "Authenticate API")
55      @Operation(
56          operationId = "authenticate",
57          summary = "ユーザ認証を行う（curlのテスト用）",
58          description = "ログイン名とパスワードに一致するユーザを取得する")
59      @Parameters({
60          @Parameter(name = "loginId", description = "ログインId", required = true,
61              schema = @Schema(implementation = String.class, minLength = 5, maxLength = 10)),
62          @Parameter(name = "password",  description = "パスワード", required = true,
63              schema = @Schema(implementation = String.class, minLength = 5, maxLength = 10))
64      })
65      @APIResponse(
66          responseCode = "200",
67          description = "認証成功",
68          content = @Content(mediaType = "application/json", schema = @Schema(implementation = UserAccountResourceDto.class)))
69      @APIResponse(responseCode = "400", ref = "#/components/responses/ParameterError")
70      @APIResponse(responseCode = "404", ref = "#/components/responses/NotFound")
71      @APIResponse(responseCode = "500", ref = "#/components/responses/ServerError")
72      UserAccountResourceDto authenticate(
73                  @LoginId @QueryParam("loginId") String loginId,
74                  @Passowrd @QueryParam("password") String password);
75  
76  
77      @POST
78      @Path("/login")
79      @Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
80      @Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
81      @Tag(name = "Authenticate API")
82      @Operation(
83          operationId = "authenticate",
84          summary = "ユーザ認証を行う",
85          description = "ログイン名とパスワードに一致するユーザを取得する")
86      @Parameter(
87              name = "loginDto", description = "ログインIDとパスワード", required = true,
88              content = @Content(mediaType = "application/json",
89              schema = @Schema(type = SchemaType.OBJECT, implementation = LoginDto.class)))
90      @APIResponse(
91          responseCode = "200",
92          description = "認証成功",
93          content = @Content(mediaType = "application/json", schema = @Schema(implementation = UserAccountResourceDto.class)))
94      @APIResponse(responseCode = "400", ref = "#/components/responses/ParameterError")
95      @APIResponse(responseCode = "404", ref = "#/components/responses/NotFound")
96      @APIResponse(responseCode = "500", ref = "#/components/responses/ServerError")
97      UserAccountResourceDto authenticate(@Valid LoginDto loginDto);
98  
99      @GET
100     @Path("/reservations/item/{itemId}/startdate/{startDate}")
101     @Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
102     @Tag(name = "Member API")
103     @Operation(
104         operationId = "findReservationByRentalItemAndStartDate",
105         summary = "指定されたレンタル品と利用開始日で予約を検索する",
106         description = "指定されたレンタル品と利用開始日に一致する予約を検索する")
107     @Parameters({
108         @Parameter(name = "itemId", description = "レンタル品ID", in = ParameterIn.PATH, required = true),
109         @Parameter(name = "startDate", description = "利用開始日", in = ParameterIn.PATH, required = true,
110             schema = @Schema(implementation = String.class, example = "20201230", format = "yyyyMMdd"))
111     })
112     @APIResponse(responseCode = "200",
113         description = "検索結果",
114         content = @Content(mediaType = "application/json", schema =
115             @Schema(type = SchemaType.ARRAY, implementation = ReservationResourceDto.class)))
116     @APIResponse(responseCode = "400", ref = "#/components/responses/ParameterError")
117     @APIResponse(responseCode = "404", ref = "#/components/responses/NotFound")
118     @APIResponse(responseCode = "500", ref = "#/components/responses/ServerError")
119     List<ReservationResourceDto> findReservationByRentalItemAndStartDate(
120                 @RmsId @PathParam("itemId") Integer itemId,
121                 @NotNull @PathParam("startDate") LocalDate startDate);
122 
123 
124     @GET
125     @Path("/reservations/reserver/{reserverId}")
126     @Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
127     @Tag(name = "Member API")
128     @Operation(
129         operationId = "findReservationByReserverId",
130         summary = "指定されたユーザが予約者の予約を検索する",
131         description = "指定されたユーザが予約者の予約を検索する")
132     @Parameters({
133         @Parameter(name = "reserverId", description = "ユーザID", in = ParameterIn.PATH, required = true)
134     })
135     @APIResponse(responseCode = "200",
136         description = "検索結果",
137         content = @Content(mediaType = "application/json", schema =
138             @Schema(type = SchemaType.ARRAY, implementation = ReservationResourceDto.class)))
139     @APIResponse(responseCode = "400", ref = "#/components/responses/ParameterError")
140     @APIResponse(responseCode = "500", ref = "#/components/responses/ServerError")
141     List<ReservationResourceDto> findReservationByReserverId(
142                 @RmsId @PathParam("reserverId") Integer reserverId);
143 
144     @GET
145     @Path("/reservations/own")
146     @Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
147     @Tag(name = "Member API")
148     @Operation(
149         operationId = "getOwnReservations",
150         summary = "自分の予約一覧を取得する",
151         description = "ログインユーザが予約者となっている予約の一覧を取得する。このAPIは/reservations/?reserverId={reserverId}のエイリアスとなっている")
152     @APIResponse(responseCode = "200",
153         description = "検索結果",
154         content = @Content(mediaType = "application/json", schema =
155             @Schema(type = SchemaType.ARRAY, implementation = ReservationResourceDto.class)))
156     @APIResponse(responseCode = "400", ref = "#/components/responses/ParameterError")
157     List<ReservationResourceDto> getOwnReservations();
158 
159     @GET
160     @Path("/items")
161     @Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
162     @Tag(name = "Member API")
163     @Operation(
164         operationId = "getAllRentalItems",
165         summary = "レンタル品の全件を取得する",
166         description = "登録されているすべてのレンタル品を取得する")
167     @APIResponse(responseCode = "200",
168         description = "検索結果",
169         content = @Content(mediaType = "application/json", schema = @Schema(type = SchemaType.ARRAY, implementation = RentalItemResourceDto.class)))
170     List<RentalItemResourceDto> getAllRentalItems();
171 
172 
173     @GET
174     @Path("/users")
175     @Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
176     @Tag(name = "Member API")
177     @Operation(
178         operationId = "getAllUserAccounts",
179         summary = "ユーザの全件を取得する",
180         description = "登録されているすべてのユーザを取得する")
181     @APIResponse(responseCode = "200",
182         description = "検索結果",
183         content = @Content(mediaType = "application/json", schema = @Schema(type = SchemaType.ARRAY, implementation = UserAccountResourceDto.class)))
184     List<UserAccountResourceDto> getAllUserAccounts();
185 
186     @POST
187     @Path("/reservations")
188     @Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
189     @Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
190     @Tag(name = "Member API")
191     @Operation(
192         operationId = "addReservation",
193         summary = "予約を登録する",
194         description = "依頼された予約内容を登録する")
195     @Parameter(
196         name = "addReservationDto", description = "登録内容", required = true,
197         content = @Content(mediaType = "application/json",
198         schema = @Schema(type = SchemaType.OBJECT, implementation = AddReservationDto.class)))
199     @APIResponse(
200         responseCode = "200",
201         description = "登録成功",
202         content = @Content(mediaType = "application/json", schema = @Schema(type = SchemaType.OBJECT, implementation = ReservationResourceDto.class)))
203     @APIResponse(responseCode = "400", ref = "#/components/responses/ParameterError")
204     @APIResponse(responseCode = "404", ref = "#/components/responses/UnknownData")
205     @APIResponse(responseCode = "409", ref = "#/components/responses/DataDupricate")
206     @APIResponse(responseCode = "500", ref = "#/components/responses/ServerError")
207     ReservationResourceDto addReservation(@Valid AddReservationDto dto);
208 
209     @DELETE
210     @Path("/reservations/{reservationId}")
211     @Tag(name = "Member API")
212     @Operation(
213         operationId = "cancelReservation",
214         summary = "予約をキャンセルする",
215         description = "依頼された予約IDに対する予約をキャンセルする。予約のキャンセルは予約した人しか行えない。"
216                 + "他の人が予約キャンセルを行った場合は禁止操作としてエラーにする")
217     @Parameter(
218         name = "itemId", description = "予約ID", in = ParameterIn.PATH, required = true)
219     @APIResponse(
220         responseCode = "200",
221         description = "登録成功")
222     @APIResponse(responseCode = "400", ref = "#/components/responses/ParameterError")
223     @APIResponse(responseCode = "404", ref = "#/components/responses/UnknownData")
224     @APIResponse(responseCode = "409", ref = "#/components/responses/Forbidden")
225     @APIResponse(responseCode = "500", ref = "#/components/responses/ServerError")
226     void cancelReservation(@RmsId @PathParam("reservationId") Integer reservationId);
227 
228     @POST
229     @Path("/items")
230     @Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
231     @Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
232     @Tag(name = "Admin API")
233     @Operation(
234         operationId = "addRentalItem",
235         summary = "レンタル品を登録する",
236         description = "依頼されたレンタル品を登録する")
237     @Parameter(
238         name = "addRentalItemDto", description = "登録内容", required = true,
239         content = @Content(mediaType = "application/json",
240         schema = @Schema(type = SchemaType.OBJECT, implementation = AddRentalItemDto.class)))
241     @APIResponse(
242         responseCode = "200",
243         description = "登録成功",
244         content = @Content(mediaType = "application/json", schema = @Schema(type = SchemaType.OBJECT, implementation = RentalItemResourceDto.class)))
245     @APIResponse(responseCode = "400", ref = "#/components/responses/ParameterError")
246     @APIResponse(responseCode = "409", ref = "#/components/responses/DataDupricate")
247     @APIResponse(responseCode = "500", ref = "#/components/responses/ServerError")
248     RentalItemResourceDto addRentalItem(@Valid AddRentalItemDto dto);
249 
250     @POST
251     @Path("/users")
252     @Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
253     @Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
254     @Tag(name = "Admin API")
255     @Operation(
256         operationId = "addUserAccount",
257         summary = "ユーザを登録する",
258         description = "依頼されたユーザを登録する")
259     @Parameter(
260         name = "addUserAccountDto", description = "登録内容", required = true,
261         content = @Content(mediaType = "application/json",
262         schema = @Schema(type = SchemaType.OBJECT, implementation = AddUserAccountDto.class)))
263     @APIResponse(
264         responseCode = "200",
265         description = "登録成功",
266         content = @Content(mediaType = "application/json", schema = @Schema(type = SchemaType.OBJECT, implementation = UserAccountResourceDto.class)))
267     @APIResponse(responseCode = "400", ref = "#/components/responses/ParameterError")
268     @APIResponse(responseCode = "409", ref = "#/components/responses/DataDupricate")
269     @APIResponse(responseCode = "500", ref = "#/components/responses/ServerError")
270     UserAccountResourceDto addUserAccount(@Valid AddUserAccountDto dto);
271 
272     @PUT
273     @Path("/users")
274     @Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
275     @Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
276     @Tag(name = "Admin API")
277     @Operation(
278         operationId = "updateUserAccount",
279         summary = "ユーザを更新する",
280         description = "依頼されたユーザを更新する")
281     @Parameter(
282         name = "dto", description = "更新内容", required = true,
283         content = @Content(mediaType = "application/json",
284         schema = @Schema(type = SchemaType.OBJECT, implementation = UserAccountResourceDto.class)))
285     @APIResponse(
286         responseCode = "200",
287         description = "登録成功",
288         content = @Content(mediaType = "application/json", schema = @Schema(type = SchemaType.OBJECT, implementation = UserAccountResourceDto.class)))
289     @APIResponse(responseCode = "400", ref = "#/components/responses/ParameterError")
290     @APIResponse(responseCode = "404", ref = "#/components/responses/UnknownData")
291     @APIResponse(responseCode = "500", ref = "#/components/responses/ServerError")
292     UserAccountResourceDtoexternal/webapi/dto/UserAccountResourceDto.html#UserAccountResourceDto">UserAccountResourceDto updateUserAccount(@Valid UserAccountResourceDto dto);
293 }
